name: Intraday Treasury Futures Bollinger Mean Reverter
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy for the most-liquid (front-month) U.S. Treasury futures contract, operating on 15-minute bars. Uses Bollinger Bands(20,2σ) with a volume filter for entries, exits at mid-band or pre-set TP/SL, and sizes positions so hard stop equals 1 % equity risk. Continuous contract built via liquidity-based roll.
